item.title: C’est quoi exactement les « Game Key Cards » de la Nintendo Switch 2 ?
item.description: Depuis l’annonce de la Nintendo Switch 2, un élément spécifique alimente les débats depuis de longs mois : les Cartes Clés de jeu, plus connues sous le nom de Game Key Cards.

item.title: Upgrade your home cinema with $200 off the four-star-rated Sonos Arc Ultra
item.description: This Sonos Arc Ultra deal is just $20 away from its all-time record-low price on Amazon.

item.title: Cette structure de matière noire expliquerait enfin l’étrange danse des galaxies autour de la Voie lactée
item.description: La saga de la matière noire en astrophysique et cosmologie se décline sous plusieurs aspects. L'un d'eux concerne une énigme du groupe de galaxies contenant la Voie lactée et Andromède, notamment, et qui vient peut-être de trouver sa solution.

item.title: xAI Wants to Hire Award-Winning Writers to Train Elon Musk’s Stupid AI Chatbot
item.description: How many award-winning writers are desperate enough to train Grok?

item.title: Blue Origin is pausing its space tourist flights to work on lunar landers for NASA
item.description: Blue Origin plans to put a focus on the development of its human lunar capabilities, so it won’t be sending tourists to space for at least the next two years. That means we won’t be seeing any New Shepard launches for quite some time. Blue Origin is one of the companies NASA chose to develop human landing systems for its Artemis program, along with SpaceX. Specifically, it will work on landers for the Artemis III and Artemis V missions. The company was originally contracted to build the human landing system that would transfer astronauts from NASA’s Gateway station to the moon’s South Pole reg...

item.title: Nothing Phone (3a) Pro vs OnePlus Nord 5 : lequel est le meilleur bon plan des soldes ?
item.description: À quelques jours de la fin des soldes d’hiver, deux smartphones milieu de gamme en promo se démarquent : le Nothing Phone (3a) Pro et le OnePlus Nord 5. Tous deux notés 8/10 par la rédaction, ils représentent deux très bonnes affaires, mais lequel choisir ?

item.title: The Super Bowl Will Test New Device for Blind Fans Who Want to Enjoy the Big Game
item.description: The NFL and OneCourt are providing about 10 Super Bowl attendees a device that translates live gameplay into tactile feedback.

item.title: Cassette Boy forces you to see its world in a whole new way
item.description: It's no secret that Cassette Boy is inspired by the classics. It's a top-down adventure game in the vein of a retro Legend of Zelda, while your home base is a small town like in an older Pokémon game, complete with a mom who is constantly wishing you well. The game's blocky 3D graphics evoke […]

item.title: When agentic AI systems fall into the wrong hands
item.description: Agentic AI is transforming daily life, but its autonomy raises urgent privacy, security and ethical risks.

item.title: WWE Royal Rumble 2026 Live Streams: How to watch on Netflix, ESPN from anywhere
item.description: All the ways to watch 2026 WWE Royal Rumble live streams online, with AJ Styles vs Gunther and Sami Zayn vs Drew McIntyre also on the cards in Riyadh.
